answers.answer: It's just a basic appointment.Measure the belly, check your weight,  listen to the heartbeat.
For my 28 weeks with my 1st one they did the test, pelvic exam, and ultrasound I believe. But I was high risk with 1st one.
My drink wasnt nasty at all! It was orange. Ive had one of those done before that was red and it was really gross!! They just measured my belly and listened to the heartbeat
The drink they gave me tasted like Hawaiian punch.  It was not nasty at all. && also what aubsmommy said.. it's just a basic checkup.
You're welcome.  I got orange and it was actually really good! Good luck!
I got the fruit punch.. yuck!

question: I go tomorrow for mine. I know you drink that nasty glucose drink for gestational diabetes but I can't remember what else is done. Like pelvic exam or anything else. Any of you ladies remember?
title: 28 weeks check up
